name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: Learn the basics of computer science, including algorithms, data structures, and programming fundamentals.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: An in-depth look at data structures and algorithms, with a focus on efficiency and problem-solving.

name: Web Development
description: Explore the fundamentals of web development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks.

name: Database Management
description: Learn about relational databases, SQL, and database design principles.

name: Machine Learning Basics
description: An introduction to machine learning concepts, including supervised and unsupervised learning.
